role.argrole: thing arg0 is most familiar with

example.parse: (IP (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NN 投资人)) (VP (VV 介绍) (NP-OBJ (NN 技术))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 应该) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 创业者)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VV 驾轻就熟)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 工作))))))
